result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael L Williams

records.addlTxt:
9:00 AM Defendant Michael L Williams appeared by video.  Attorney Scott S. Schlough appeared by video for Michael L Williams.  Attorney Ellen Anderson appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Waive reading of the Information, enter a plea of NG.  Atty asking for status conference.
Status conference scheduled for November 28, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Status conference on November 28, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

2:38 PM Defendant Michael L Williams appeared by video.  Attorney Scott S. Schlough appeared by video for Michael L Williams.  Attorney Emily Nelson appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. State calls Deputy Tyler Branstad, oath administered. Court has colloquy with DE on his right to appear in person, DE will waive his right to personal appearance. 2:42 pm Direct by the State. Record shall reflect witness has identified the DE.  2:47pm Cross by Atty Schlough. 2:50pm Witness dismissed.  Court finds PC, will bind over for Trial.  Set for Arraignment October 10, 2022 @ 9:00am. Adj 2:52pm.
Preliminary hearing on August 16, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on August 16, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Preliminary hearing on August 16, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

2:03 PM Defendant Michael L Williams appeared by video.  Attorney Scott S. Schlough in court for Michael L Williams.  Attorney Emily Margaret Nelson in court for State of Wisconsin. Waive formal reading of the CC. DE/Atty will waive TL for PH, court instructs on waiver of TL, DE understands waiver of TL, court will accept waiver of TL.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 16, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on May 31, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on May 17, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

1:12 PM Defendant Michael L Williams appeared by video.  Attorney Emily Margaret Nelson in court for State of Wisconsin.  PD office has been unable to find counsel as of yet.  Set for Adj Init App May 17, 2022 @ 1:00PM. DE will appear via ZOOM. Adj 1:13pm
OSPD Report.  To Date 42 attempts have been made for obtaining counsel.

1:27pm DE appears with Sonia Anderson.  Will set this case for Init App May 3, 2022 @ 1:00PM.  Atty asking that the DE be allowed to appear via ZOOM. Court will allow ZOOM appearance for this hearing. Adj 1:29pm.

Any cash bond posted for Defendant shall be used for fines, costs and restitution pursuant to WI STAT 969.13(5).  No contact with SKL, her residence, place of employment or any place she is at. Set for Init App March 15, 2022 @ 1:00PM

3:04pm Time set for a bond hearing.  DE appears from RC Jail with Katherine Cook.  State appears by DA Barna.  Victim appears via ZOOM.  Victim does not wish to have any input on bond.  State would like to hear argument on bond, any ties to the community.  Atty Cook states DE has been residing in Weyerhaeuser, prior had residence in Eau Claire, is seeking employment.  State responds, will be asking for a no contact with the victim and her residence, believes cash is necessary.  Atty Cook responds, has no objection to no contact with the victim, DE has friends he can reside with in Eau Claire if released, states DE has been incarcerated for almost a week, knows the importance of appearing for court.  The court has concerns, believes DE is a flight risk, was apprehended in Tomah.  $2500.00 cash bond, no contact with SKL, her residence or any place she is present.  Set for Init App March 15, 2022 @ 1:00PM. Adj 3:13pm.
